snippet.title: Way of the Samurai 2 - 2003 PS2 Trailer [High Quality]
snippet.description:
High quality version of the trailer of the game Way of the Samurai 2, released for PlayStation 2 in 2003 and PSP in 2009.

Source: Official Playstation Magazine bonus disc
